name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer with 8+ years of experience in developing high-quality web applications. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and frameworks such as **React**, **Vue**, and **AngularJS**, ensuring a robust and user-friendly interface. Strong expertise in integrating **REST API** services, enhancing application functionality and performance. Adept with **MySQL**, **MongoDB**, and caching strategies using **Redis** to optimize database performance. Proven skills in utilizing modern tools like **Docker** for containerization, **Jest** for testing, and **Webpack** for module bundling. My background in e-commerce, finance, and healthcare allows me to deliver tailored solutions that meet business requirements while adhering to best practices in web development.

experience.responsibilities:
Leveraged **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** to build responsive user interfaces with **React**, **Vue**, and **AngularJS**, enhancing user engagement and experience in a cloud-native environment.
Designed and implemented robust **REST APIs** using **Node.js**, integrating seamlessly with backend services and enhancing functionality while ensuring data integrity with **JSON**.
Optimized application performance and user experience with **Webpack** for efficient asset management and code splitting, significantly improving load times by **30%**.
Developed interactive and immersive experiences using **Three.js** and **WebGL** for advanced visualizations, resulting in increased user interaction metrics by **50%**.
Collaborated with backend development teams to ensure smooth data flow between **PHP** applications utilizing **Symfony** and frontend renderings, improving overall system efficiency.
Implemented end-to-end testing with **Jest** and **PHPUnit**, establishing a rigorous QA process that led to a **40%** reduction in production bugs.
Utilized **Docker** for containerization of applications, streamlining development workflows and ensuring consistency across multiple deployment environments.
Enhanced application state management using **OOP** methodologies and **ECMAScript 6**, improving code maintainability and scalability.
Established a CI/CD pipeline with **Git** for automating deployment processes, reducing manual deployment time by **60%** and increasing overall productivity.
Integrated messaging capabilities with **RabbitMQ** to facilitate asynchronous communication between front and backend services, improving system reliability and responsiveness.
Conducted code reviews and mentoring sessions to promote best practices in **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** programming, fostering a collaborative team environment and enhancing overall skill levels of the team.
Utilized performance monitoring tools to continuously assess and optimize application performance, achieving loading times of under **2 seconds**.

• Developed dynamic and user-centric frontends using **React**, **Vue**, and **AngularJS**, enhancing user experience and engagement across applications.
• Utilized **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** to build interactive features ensuring robust performance and compliance with ECMAScript 6 standards.
• Implemented RESTful APIs to facilitate seamless communication between frontend applications and backend services, ensuring optimal data exchange in **JSON** format.
• Integrated state management solutions with **Redux** and **NgRx** to optimize rendering performance and maintain application state effectively across **9** unique pages.
• Collaborated with backend developers to enhance and refactor legacy systems built in **PHP** and **Symfony**, promoting a transition towards more modern frameworks.
• Developed and conducted unit tests using **Jest** and **PHPUnit**, ensuring high quality and reliability in code, targeting **100%** test coverage goals.
• Participated in code reviews and utilized **Git** for version control, enhancing team collaboration and project transparency.
• Deployed containerized applications using **Docker**, ensuring consistent environments and facilitating the deployment of **3** separate microservices.
• Enhanced application performance by integrating **WebSocket** for real-time features, resulting in a **25%** increase in user interaction.
• Optimized database queries on **MySQL** and **MongoDB**, improving data retrieval speed by **30%**, ensuring higher application efficiency.
• Managed dependencies and build processes using **Webpack**, streamlining front-end development workflows for faster build times.
• Participated in agile ceremonies, contributing to sprint planning and execution to ensure project deliverables are met within set timelines.

Developed dynamic and responsive user interfaces using **React**, **Vue**, and **AngularJS**, leveraging **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** to enhance user engagement and satisfaction in web applications.
Implemented robust **REST APIs** to connect frontend interfaces with backend systems, ensuring efficient data exchange and real-time user interactions.
Collaborated closely with backend teams to integrate services with **MySQL** and **MongoDB**, optimizing data retrieval and influencing overall application performance.
Designed and built modular components in **TypeScript** to enable code reusability and maintainability across multiple project initiatives.
Enhanced application performance by utilizing **Webpack** for optimized asset delivery and **Jest** for comprehensive unit testing, ensuring high code quality.
Streamlined deployment processes using **Docker** for consistent environment management and application containerization.
Utilized **Redis** for caching strategies, resulting in an immediate reduction of database query loads by **30%** and improved overall application response time by **25%**.
Conducted thorough UI testing with **jQuery** and automated solutions, ensuring a seamless user experience across various devices.
Developed real-time functionalities using **WebSocket** for instant communication features, enhancing user interaction in applications.
Participated in Agile methodologies, collaborating in **Git** version control within cross-functional teams to deliver **3 major releases** annually on schedule.
Conducted performance optimization analyses using tools to validate loading speeds and reliability under peak loads, ensuring a seamless user experience during high traffic periods.
Mentored junior developers in modern frontend best practices, focusing on **OOP** principles and the latest **ECMAScript 6** features to foster a culture of continuous improvement and learning.

skills:

	REST API, gRPC APIs, JSON

	AWS (Lambda), Azure (App Services)

	PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis

	Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD

	AWS (ECS, RDS, S3), Azure (Blob, SQL)

	RabbitMQ, Celery, OAuth2, JWT, Keycloak (OIDC, RBAC), Let’s Encrypt, Nginx, Certbot, OOP, Websocket, Webpack, Jest, HTML, ECMAScript 6, REST & gRPC APIs
